text:
NEW: 777 more people have been reported dead as a result of COVID-19 pandemic in New York State, Gov. Andrew Cuomo says. 

The state’s death total is now 7,844. 

He says there’s been a dramatic decline in hospitalization growth rates. There were 17 FEWER people in ICUs yesterday
